1. Access the boards and commissions that drive your local government. Find agendas, member information, and other meeting details.
2. #### [City Council](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/220/City-Council)

   Shenandoah is a General Law city with a population of approximately 4,000 people. The city is governed by an elected city council with six members - five council members and a mayor.
